original: Melin, Paul Emanuel, ’kyrkoherde, Dalsjöfors, f. 9/12/93 i Vailstad, Ska-rab. k, av kontr iproisten Samuel M. o. Hilda StenboTg. G. 21 m. Margit Wid-man. Barn: Britta f. 22, Staffan 24, Margareta 30, Paul-Ragnar 32, Astrid 33, Berti-l 39. — Stud:ex. i Skara 13, teol. fil, ex. i Upps. 14, teol. kand. 19, prästv. i Skara 20. Kommiin. i Ploby 21, pred. v, MikaeJskap. i Lpps. 25, vid domkyrk. där 25, kyrkoh. i Dala 30, i Toarp, Rångedala, Äspered, Tärby o. Varnum fr. 46. Led. av Skara stifts sjömansråd, ordf. i Toarps kvrkofuiLlm. -sed. 47.
translated: Melin, Paul Emanuel, 'clergyman, Dalsjöfors, born on 9/12/1893 in Vailstad, Ska-rab. county, son of the parish priest Samuel M. and Hilda StenboTg. Married on 21 to Margit Wid-man. Children: Britta born in 1922, Staffan in 1924, Margareta in 1930, Paul-Ragnar in 1932, Astrid in 1933, and Berti-l in 1939. — Obtained a high school degree in Skara in 1913, Bachelor of Theology degree in Uppsala in 1914, Theology candidate degree in 1919, ordained priest in Skara in 1920. Served as a curate in Ploby in 1921, preacher at Mikaelskap in Uppsala in 1925, at the Cathedral in Uppsala in 1925, and as a vicar in Dala in 1930, in Toarp, Rångedala, Äspered, Tärby, and Varnum starting from 1946. Member of the Seamen's Council of Skara diocese, chairman of the Toarps Church Council since 1947.
